property.name: gateway.port
property.description: The HTTP port for the Gateway.

property.name: gateway.path
property.description: The default context path for the gateway.

property.name: gateway.gateway.conf.dir
property.description: The directory within GATEWAY_HOME that contains gateway topology files and deployments.

property.name: gateway.hadoop.kerberos.secured
property.description: Boolean flag indicating whether the Hadoop cluster protected by Gateway is secured with Kerberos

property.name: java.security.auth.login.config
property.description: Absolute path to JASS login config file

property.name: sun.security.krb5.debug
property.description: Boolean flag indicating whether to enable debug messages for krb5 authentication

property.name: gateway.websocket.feature.enabled
property.description: Enable this if you want websocket support
